attributes.action: Free meals for kids. Criminals get it!!
attributes.additional_details: Give our children getting an education free school meals... if criminals can have free food!!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition calling for all children in school to be eligible for free school meals, if that's what you would like to happen.
